articles.title: The unlocked Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G and Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G are more affordable than ever - PhoneArena
articles.description: Perhaps affordable is a bit of a stretch, but following the latest round of Amazon discounts, the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 5G and Galaxy Z Fold 2 5G are less expensive than ever before.
